Summary: Orb Like Object rapidly accelerates & decellerates
divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading into work when I noticed object traveling from east to west. It seemed round and kinda flickered almost like it was rotating with sunlight reflecting off of it as it moved west. I started recording it with my phone and tracked it as it past behind a brick building. When it reemerged it literally shot out the other side. Somehow it accelerated instantly and then just as suddenly slowed down.At the time I thought my eyes were playing tricks on me. After reviewing the shaky footage it did indeed appear to do what I had witnessed. After stabilizing the footage the acceleration of the object is clearly seen and in my opinion is quite remarkable. Object continued traveling east then banked to a more south east direction. I stopped recording at that point so I could get into work on time.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Utica
